snippet: One in 10 girls worldwide have been forced into a sexual act, and six in 10 children ages 2 to 14 are regularly beaten by caregivers, according to Unicef.
abstract: United Nations' children's agency Unicef reports that 1 in 10 girls worldwide have been forced into a sexual act, and 6 in 10 children ages 2 to 14 are regularly beaten by parents and caregivers.
lead_paragraph: One in 10 girls worldwide have been forced into a sexual act, and six in 10 children ages 2 to 14 are regularly beaten by caregivers, according to Unicef.

headline.main: Unicef Report Details Endemic Violence Against Children
